sentences.en: By " multicomponent systems " polymer chemists mean polymer blends, copolymers and reinforced composites.
sentences.cn: 聚合物化学工作者所称的 “ 多组分体系 ” 是指聚合物共混体, 共聚物和增强复合材料.

sentences.en: Centrifuging, washing, and filtering may separate any fraction of polymer that occurred by an emulsion process.
sentences.cn: 离心, 洗涤, 和过滤可以分离乳液法制得的任何级分的聚合物.

sentences.en: Cleavage of secondary bonds can also be responsible for polymer deterioration.
sentences.cn: 次价键的分裂往往也能引起聚合体劣化.

sentences.en: Coverage of polymer particles is obviously influenced by emulsifier structure.
sentences.cn: 显然聚合物胶粒总数受乳化剂结构的影响.

sentences.en: Ferric Chloride alone gives polymer with benzene.
sentences.cn: 三氧化铁可单独催化苯的聚合.

sentences.en: Latex, a material obtained from rubber trees, is a natural polymer of isoprene.
sentences.cn: 乳胶，一种从橡树获得的物质，是天然的异戊二烯聚合物。

sentences.en: Many polymers, such as nylon, are artificial.
sentences.cn: 许多聚合物是人造的，比如说尼龙。

sentences.en: Most polymer emulsion may coagulate when they enter waste streams.
sentences.cn: 多数聚合物乳浊液在进入废水流时可能凝聚.

sentences.en: One percent phenyl - beta - naphthylamine was added to the recovered polymer as an antioxidant.
sentences.cn: 将1%苯基 - β - 萘胺作为抗氧化剂加到所得到的聚合物中.

sentences.en: Organisms that cause polymer deterioration include bacteria, fungi, marine animals, and borers of various types.
sentences.cn: 能够造成聚合物劣化的生物体很多,如细菌 、 真菌 、 海生动物和各种蛀虫等.

sentences.en: Silane coupling agents are compatible with almost every type of organic polymer.
sentences.cn: 硅烷偶联剂几乎对每一种类型的有机聚合物都是合适的.

sentences.en: So, what I want to do is go back to this simple polymer configurational model that we introduced before.
sentences.cn: 那么，我想做的是回到,简单的聚合物构型模型,我们之前介绍过的。

sentences.en: Standard text - books of polymer sciences contain tables of Q - e values.
sentences.cn: 聚合物科学的规范教科书中有一些Q-e值表格.

sentences.en: The nature of the polymer is currently a trade secret.
sentences.cn: 这一聚合物的性质目前是个商业机密。

sentences.en: The neutralization equivalent of the polymer is 750 ( theoretical - 681 ).
sentences.cn: 聚和物的中和当量为750 ( 理论上为681 ).

sentences.en: The term condensation is now firmly entrenched in the literature of polymer science.
sentences.cn: 缩合这个术语,现在在聚合物科学文献中已牢固的确定.

sentences.en: The viscosity of the polymer was 2.16 poise.
There was a weakening of the intermolecular bonds, primarily in the amorphous region of the polymer.
sentences.cn: 分子间键合减弱, 尤其在聚合物的无定形区内更为明显.

聚合；[高分子] 聚合作用

trans.tran_en: a chemical compound that has a simple structure of large molecules
